short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An even better experience when interacting with Howdous
short.es: Una experiencia aún mejor al interactuar con Howdous
short.sv: En ännu bättre upplevelse när du arbetar med Howdous.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By enabling Enhanced mode, Howdous will open in fullscreen to give you an overall better experience on smaller screens. Enjoy!

Works great for teachers too in combination with Howdou for Google Classroom.
